name: Raft.io
description:
This is a senior project assignment/research project on how to update a game (blog can be found at this link https://basisseniorprojects.com/prescott/author/ivanm/). If possible it is encouraged that you leave a comment suggesting a future update and a honest review on how this update is. Comments will be looked at and used for future updates. I will try to get out one update a week starting now (2/9/2023) and continuing for ten weeks. Controls are currently WASD to move arrow keys to turn. When you have the required amount of wood you can click the button for the type of tile you wish to place and where (adjacent to your current boat) you would like to place it. If these controls are not to your liking please leave a comment with your desired control method and I will try to implement it.

graphics by: Georges "TRaK" Grondin, Bart K., Proxy Games, JCW

sound by: jasinski, Varkalandar, Thimras
